reviewText:
Beyond the MC vs Police conflicts, it also nicely portrays the ever present social political English vs French conflicts in day to day Canadian life.
I saw Sons of Anarchy before Last Chapter.  Even though Last Chapter was made a decade earlier, it is not dated by comparison.  It is a big city plot (Toronto-Montreal) compared to a small town (Charming) setting.  Very good addition to my library of motorcycle movies and series.
I was on the edge of seat watching the series waiting to see who was going to fall next!
A bit different from American TV. The acting is a little lacking, but overal a good purchase. Quality 1%er entertainment.
